<a id="class_VisualShader"></a>

# VisualShader

**Inherits:** [Shader](class_shader.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A custom shader program with a visual editor.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class provides a graph-like visual editor for creating a [Shader](class_shader.md). Although **VisualShader**\ s do not require coding, they share the same logic with script shaders. They use [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md)\ s that can be connected to each other to control the flow of the shader. The visual shader graph is converted to a script shader behind the scenes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using VisualShaders](../tutorials/shaders/visual_shaders.md)

A vertex shader, operating on vertices.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_FRAGMENT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_FRAGMENT** = `1`

A fragment shader, operating on fragments (pixels).<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_LIGHT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_LIGHT** = `2`

A shader for light calculations.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_START"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_START** = `3`

A function for the "start" stage of particle shader.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_PROCESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_PROCESS** = `4`

A function for the "process" stage of particle shader.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_COLLIDE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_COLLIDE** = `5`

A function for the "collide" stage (particle collision handler) of particle shader.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_START_CUSTOM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_START_CUSTOM** = `6`

A function for the "start" stage of particle shader, with customized output.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_PROCESS_CUSTOM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_PROCESS_CUSTOM** = `7`

A function for the "process" stage of particle shader, with customized output.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_SKY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_SKY** = `8`

A shader for 3D environment's sky.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_FOG"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_FOG** = `9`

A compute shader that runs for each froxel of the volumetric fog map.<a id="class_VisualShader_constant_TYPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type) **TYPE_MAX** = `10`

<a id="class_VisualShader_method_connect_nodes_forced"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **connect_nodes_forced**\ (\ type\: [Type](class_visualshader.md#enum_VisualShader_Type), from_node\: [int](class_int.md), from_port\: [int](class_int.md), to_node\: [int](class_int.md), to_port\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShader_method_connect_nodes_forced)

Connects the specified nodes and ports, even if they can't be connected. Such connection is invalid and will not function properly.
